distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for pam fixes the following issue:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-17953: Fixed IP address and subnet handling of pam_access.so that was not honoured correctly when a single host was specified (bsc#1115640).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A incorrect variable in a SUSE specific patch for pam_access rule matching in PAM 1.3.0 in openSUSE Leap 15.0 and SUSE Linux Enterprise 15 could lead to pam_access rules not being applied (fail open).
notes.title: Vulnerability description
